title: 37 - Stavros Halkias
itunes:title: 37 - Stavros Halkias
description: Stavvy baby! We’ve got Stavros Halkias on the podcast and damn does he have a tale for you legends. You may know Stav from Comedy Central, IFC, and his own podcasts Cumtown and Pod Don’t Lie, but we’re going for a deep dive with him on this episode. We’re talking about everything from authenticity to high school hierarchies to the consequences of trying to impress others. Here’s five words to describe this episode: stop trying to be cool.

itunes:author: All Things Comedy
